definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: So don. t lose sight of your healthy diet pyramid when you do your shopping.
sentences.chinese: 所以你购物时要记起健康饮食金字塔。

sentences.english: Marianne was going to retort, but she remembered her promises and forbore.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽安正想反驳，但她记起了自己的诺言，便。

sentences.english: Mute recall him , maybe grow this world here being able to not have forgot.
sentences.chinese: 默默的记起他，也许此生此世都不会忘记了。

sentences.english: I can recollect many things which I did not understand, but which stirred me deeply.
sentences.chinese: 我能记起许多我不能理解但却使我深深激动的事情。

sentences.english: And then you remember that you moved when you were about three years old.
sentences.chinese: 这时你记起大概三岁的时候，你们搬过一次家。

sentences.english: Only when he steps toward the table do I remember his face.
sentences.chinese: 只在他朝桌子这边走过来的时候我才记起他的脸来。

sentences.english: They should write down everything they remember.
sentences.chinese: 他们应该写下他们能记起的所有事。

sentences.english: Sometimes we are able to remember our dreams while sometimes we are not.
sentences.chinese: 有时我们能记起做过的梦，有时却不能。

sentences.english: As I recall the many things we left unsaid.
sentences.chinese: 我记起许多我们没说出的往事。

sentences.english: For the first list, I was able to recall only 12 %.
sentences.chinese: 第一张生词表，我只记起其中12%的单词的意思。

sentences.english: And then the children remembered that Martha couldn't see the wishes.
sentences.chinese: 于是孩子们记起马莎是看不出这些许愿的事的。

sentences.english: Ponti worried Jackie remember previously I had participated in the kidnapping Jackie.
sentences.chinese: 庞很担忧杰姬记起以前本人曾经参与过绑架杰姬的事。

sentences.english: The animals remember people even after long separation.
sentences.chinese: 马能记起分别已久的人。

sentences.english: Gallicantu means "cock crowing " and it remembers the three denials of Peter.
sentences.chinese: 该法亚意思是“鸡叫”，它使人记起彼得三次不认主。

sentences.english: When I woke, Luda once several times called me as Chau Jie.
sentences.chinese: 记起当我醒来时，路德曾数次称我为桥杰。

sentences.english: I suddenly recalled A-do's stick of skewered mutton?
sentences.chinese: 我突然记起阿杜的那串羊肉？

definition: to recall/to think of/to call to mind
to think of/to call to mind/to anticipate
to be forgotten/to fade from memory
to realize suddenly/to wake up with a start
to become aware/to detect/to realize/to perceive
to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce
